sectionTitle: Real Solutions for the Supply Chain
sectionDescription: From identity verification to DeFi financing. Discover how PROCUREDATA transforms every link.

kyb-onboarding.title: KYB Onboarding
kyb-onboarding.shortDesc: Instant supplier verification through sovereign identity (DID) on Pontus-X.
kyb-onboarding.fullDesc: Automate the verification process for new suppliers using Decentralized Identity (DID). Instead of weeks of document exchange and manual verifications, the supplier connects their wallet, signs an authorization, and PROCUREDATA automatically verifies their corporate registration against official sources.
kyb-onboarding.problem: Traditional supplier onboarding takes 2-4 weeks, requires manual PDF document exchange, and creates silos of outdated information.
kyb-onboarding.solution: PROCUREDATA generates a unique DID (did:ethr) for each supplier when connecting their wallet. This DID is verified against official corporate registries through Pontus-X.
kyb-onboarding.testimonialQuote: We reduced supplier onboarding from 3 weeks to 15 minutes. The verified DID gives us complete confidence in each new partner.

huella-carbono.title: Carbon Footprint
huella-carbono.shortDesc: Immutable and auditable ESG reports to comply with CSRD regulations.
huella-carbono.fullDesc: European CSRD regulations require large companies to report Scope 3 emissions (supply chain). PROCUREDATA allows you to request and aggregate ESG reports from all your suppliers in a structured manner.
huella-carbono.problem: Companies must report emissions from their entire supply chain (Scope 3), but collecting verifiable data from hundreds of suppliers is a manual process.
huella-carbono.solution: Each supplier uploads their ESG report to PROCUREDATA, which generates a cryptographic hash stored on Pontus-X.
huella-carbono.testimonialQuote: We can finally report Scope 3 with auditable data. Our investors and regulators are comfortable with blockchain traceability.

marketplace-euroe.title: Data Marketplace
marketplace-euroe.shortDesc: Secure trading of industrial assets paying with EUROe.
marketplace-euroe.fullDesc: Monetize your industrial data securely. Publish datasets on the PROCUREDATA marketplace, set price and usage conditions, and receive instant payments in EUROe.
marketplace-euroe.problem: Selling B2B data involves long negotiations, costly legal contracts, and international payment risk.
marketplace-euroe.solution: PROCUREDATA allows publishing datasets with fixed price or subscription in EUROe. The smart contract acts as escrow.
marketplace-euroe.testimonialQuote: We sell consumer trend data globally. EUROe eliminated international banking friction.

kill-switch.title: Data Kill-Switch
kill-switch.shortDesc: Real-time access revocation in case of security breaches.
kill-switch.fullDesc: When a security breach is detected, every second counts. PROCUREDATA's Kill-Switch allows you to revoke all access to shared data with a single click.
kill-switch.problem: In a data breach, revoking traditional access can take hours or days.
kill-switch.solution: PROCUREDATA's RevokeAccessButton executes a smart contract that invalidates all Access Tokens in a single blockchain transaction.
kill-switch.testimonialQuote: When we detected the breach, we cut access in 3 seconds with a single click.

pasaporte-digital.title: Digital Passport (DPP)
pasaporte-digital.shortDesc: Complete product traceability aggregating data from multiple suppliers.
pasaporte-digital.fullDesc: The Digital Product Passport (DPP) is mandatory in the EU for batteries, textiles, and electronics. PROCUREDATA allows aggregating data from the entire supply chain.
pasaporte-digital.problem: Creating a DPP requires aggregating data from dozens of suppliers, each with different formats and no guarantee of authenticity.
pasaporte-digital.solution: PROCUREDATA standardizes data collection using Catena-X/IDSA schemas.
pasaporte-digital.testimonialQuote: We complied with the European DPP ahead of schedule. PROCUREDATA allowed us to integrate data from 47 suppliers automatically.

compute-to-data.title: Compute-to-Data
compute-to-data.shortDesc: Train AI on sensitive data without exposing it outside the sandbox.
compute-to-data.fullDesc: Execute Machine Learning algorithms on your suppliers' data without the data leaving its source.
compute-to-data.problem: Training AI models requires access to large datasets, but sharing sensitive data violates GDPR and trade secrets.
compute-to-data.solution: Ocean Protocol/Pontus-X Compute-to-Data allows the algorithm to travel to the data.
compute-to-data.testimonialQuote: We analyzed demand patterns from 200 suppliers without accessing their raw data. Compute-to-Data is the future.

gestion-recalls.title: Recall Management
gestion-recalls.shortDesc: Instant tracking of defective batches across the entire supply chain.
gestion-recalls.fullDesc: A product recall requires quickly identifying all affected components and their current location.
gestion-recalls.problem: Tracking a defective batch through multiple suppliers and distributors can take weeks.
gestion-recalls.solution: PROCUREDATA maintains immutable traceability of each batch on Pontus-X.
gestion-recalls.testimonialQuote: We identified all vehicles affected by the defective airbag in 4 hours, not 4 weeks.

financiacion-defi.title: DeFi Financing
financiacion-defi.shortDesc: Blockchain-verified delivery history to access credit.
financiacion-defi.fullDesc: Finance your operations using your blockchain-verified delivery history as collateral.
financiacion-defi.problem: SME suppliers have limited access to traditional bank credit. Factoring companies have abusive rates.
financiacion-defi.solution: PROCUREDATA generates a 'Reputation Score' based on punctual deliveries verified on blockchain.
financiacion-defi.testimonialQuote: We obtained a credit line at 4% using our verified history. Traditional banks were asking for 12%.

cadena-frio.title: Cold Chain Audit
cadena-frio.shortDesc: IoT sensors record temperature immutably to resolve disputes.
cadena-frio.fullDesc: Record transport temperature data on blockchain to resolve disputes about cold chain breaks.
cadena-frio.problem: Cold chain break disputes are costly and difficult to resolve. Each party blames the other.
cadena-frio.solution: IoT sensors connected to PROCUREDATA record temperature every 60 seconds on Pontus-X.
cadena-frio.testimonialQuote: There are no more disputes about who broke the cold chain. The blockchain doesn't lie.

licencias-odrl.title: ODRL Licenses
licencias-odrl.shortDesc: Dynamic contract negotiation with temporal and usage restrictions.
licencias-odrl.fullDesc: Define exactly what the consumer can do with your data using machine-readable ODRL policies.
licencias-odrl.problem: Data licensing contracts are static PDF documents that no one reads and are impossible to automate.
licencias-odrl.solution: PROCUREDATA translates legal conditions into ODRL policies executable by smart contracts.
licencias-odrl.testimonialQuote: Our licenses are now smart contracts. Customers see exactly what they can do, and the system enforces it.
